statement: Critic passes are mandatory per evidence item with standardized naming, and rubric/score acceptance is gated by regex parser success with durable error states and retries.
rationale: User requirement defines regex-gated acceptance and per-evidence critics; staged batching preserves this flow.
keyAssumptions: Regex parsers are stable enough for primary acceptance gating.
validationCriteria: Blueprint defines parser-gated acceptance and error/retry states for rubric_critic and score_critic outputs.
critiquePoints: Regex-only validation may be brittle across providers; repair prompts may be needed.
questions: What is the max retry budget per item?
Should failed parses be retried with repair prompts or re-run generation?
